application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: work in accordance with British Standard
description: 1 x Laburnum anagyroides T4546 -   Fell 1 x Ulmus procera T4497 - Reduce the branch at 3 m above ground level between the stems with a cracked hazard beam, by approximately 5 m, to the existing vertical secondary branch immediately below the split.1 x Tilia x vulgaris T4533 - Reduce  2 lateral branches regrown from historic crown reduction by approximately 2 m.  Final cuts to be no greater than 100 mm diameter, leaving furnishing growth to minimise visual impact.  1 x Tilia x vulgaris T4534 - Lift canopy to 2.5 m over footpath.1 x Juglans regia  T4583 -  Prune to clear street lamp by 1 m.1 x Malus sylvestris T4614 - Lift canopy  to 3 m over footpath.1 x Tilia x vulgaris T4619 - Lift canopy over footpath to provide 3 m clearance above ground level.1 x Liquidambar styraciflua T7462 -  Lift  low pendulous branch to the east over the statue gateway to 4 m, to clear the view of the statue.1 x Ulmus procera  T7467 - Prune to clear lamp column by 1m. Tip reduce the lowest 2 lateral branches over car parking by 1.5 - 2 m, back to existing secondary branches, to maintain clearance over car parking.
